overview: Missing follows Michael Lucas as he enlists the help of Jonathan Agassi and they become tangled in a suspenseful and action-packed search for Diego Cruz in the gritty and dangerous underworld of Spain. While vacationing in Barcelona, young sex-pup Diego is seduced by hot local man Pavlvs Guell. All is going well until Diego realizes it's a set-up and is then gagged, bagged and kidnapped. Back in New York, Michael is on the phone with him when the attack takes place. They took his friend and now he'll do whomever it takes to get him back. He'll do anyone to find him.
title: Missing
